project.name: Nuxeo Platform Imaging API
project.description: Nuxeo Platform Imaging provides picture management to Nuxeo Web Platform and RCP. It provides minor picture transformation like rotation or resizing. This addon provides a pluggable adapter for picture manipulation. It makes it possible to manipulate images resources that are not document (in the document type sense) themselves. Concretely it makes it possible to still use the seam component that deals with images for some processings (for example rotation and resizing) but adapted to a specific schema.
